metadata.title: Daniel Peñaloza | Full Stack Developer Portfolio

consulting.description: Expert guidance to streamline your digital strategy. From tech solutions to growth hacks, I help you make smarter decisions for your business.

design.description: Creating visually stunning and functional designs that captivate and convert. Whether it’s UI/UX or branding, I ensure your visuals leave a lasting impression.
